required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase I- Sequential Cohort Dosing to Determine Maximum Tolerated Dose in Healthy Male Volunteers.
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Prospective, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Sequential-cohort, Escalating, Single-dose Study Designed to Determine the Maximum Tolerated Oral Dose of NW-3509A in Healthy, Male Volunteers.

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, 8-day, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, sequential-cohort study designed to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and MTD of single escalating oral doses of NW-3509A in healthy male volunteers. Five independent cohorts of 12 volunteers each will participate in this study, with the first 9 volunteers in each cohort to qualify being randomized to receive study medication and the remaining 3 to be used as backups/ alternates. In each cohort, 6 subjects will be randomly assigned to receive NW-3509A and 3 subjects will receive placebo.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate safety and tolerability and maximum tolerated dose of NW-3509a in Healthy Male Volunteers
primary_outcome.description: Cardiac monitoring of subjects includes ECG extractions, continuous Holter Monitoring, vitals signs, blood testing, SSRS (suicidality) performed,and adverse event assessment to be performed

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate safety and tolerability and maximum tolerated dose of NW-3509a in Healthy Male Volunteers
primary_outcome.description: Determine occurrence of any adverse events

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluate safety and tolerability and maximum tolerated dose of NW-3509a in Healthy Male Volunteers
primary_outcome.description: Assessment of any adverse events, laboratory tests, ECG and a physical/neurological examination. An assessment of suicidality (through performing a C-SSRS, since last visit).

secondary_outcome.measure: To determine the pharmacokinetics of NW-3509a at doses tested
secondary_outcome.time_frame: PK collected prior to dosing and through Day 3 of study

biospec_descr.textblock: PK specimens will be drawn to determine the maximum tolerated dose of NW-3509a in heathly male volunteers

overall_official.affiliation: Collaborative Neuroscience Network Phase I Unit
